alert.note: Alert for Benton; Marshall; Tippah (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 6:16PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Marshall, central Tippah, northern Benton, Fayette and Hardeman Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 616 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles north of Slayden to near Lagrange to 6 miles west of Theo. Movement was north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bolivar, Whiteville, Somerville, Michigan City, Canaan, Pocahontas, Lagrange, Warren, Macon, Oakland, Walnut, Middleton, Rossville, Moscow, Falkner, Williston, Toone, Grand Junction, Hornsby and Braden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
